name: Soft Boiled
author: まるき
description:
It’s 4:37 a.m.

You’ve just woke up and the sun hasn’t even made an intention of rising.
 Going back to bed is impossible.

You feel your stomach complaining, announcing a dooming morning 
starvation, but the drowsiness is such you can barely move. You look for
 the easiest thing to cook. You make soft-boiled eggs.

Jokes apart, this 3 color palette is meant to be simple and fulfilling, 
just like eggs. Whatever you are not able to do with it, rely on 
negative spaces and context assumption to fill in the blanks.
